headline: Morgan Stanley Says GenAI’s Momentum Could Lift These 2 Stocks Higher
summary: In the last couple of years, AI technology has become the ‘shiny new thing’ in the business world, the new tech that transforms industries with streamlined workflows, smarter applications, more satisfied customers, increased revenues – essentially, if there’s a challenge, AI is marketed as the solution.
